name: muzzajazz-system
description: 🎷 Muzzajazz - Sistema Completo de Cardápio Digital com IA

scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../cardapio-digital && npm install
scripts.reset:db: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force
